Package index

All functions

annualize_change()
Calculate annualized rate of change
cbsas
US Census Bureau CBSA Data
check_econanalyzr_df()
Validate econanalyzr tibble structure
counties
US Census Bureau Counties Data
create_diffusion_index()
Calculate a diffusion index
create_index()
Create indexed values from a numeric vector
csas
US Census Bureau CSA Data
econ_calc_trail_avg()
Append trailing-average rows in long form to econanalyzr data frame
econ_csv_write_out()
Write a validated econanalyzr tibble to CSV with a descriptive filename
econ_filter_dates()
Filter rows in an econanalyzr data frame by a closed date interval
econ_value_summary()
Apply a function to an econanalyzr data frame's numeric column after date filtering
get_bls_data()
Fetch a TSV from the BLS flat file database over HTTP with an email User-Agent and parse it
naics_codes
North American Industry Classification System Data
percent_change()
Calculate percent change between two values
regions_and_divisions
US Census Bureau Regions and Divisions Data
save_econanalyzr_chart()
Save a ggplot chart with an econanalyzr-style filename
states
US Census Bureau States Data
